title: Brothers in Arms
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B005S4FLCK.After the audacious prison camp escapade described in Borders of Infinity, Miles is on the run from the Cetagandans, who aren't about to take that kind of thing lying down. The worst of it is, Miles and his friends are starting to see double, and it takes a while to find out who is responsible.
author: Lois McMaster Bujold
